Package org.framed.orm.ui.editPolicy

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ORMAbstractXYLayoutPolicy  
    ORMAttributeOperationComponentEditPolicy
    This ComponentEditPolicy handles requests for the deletion of attributes and operations and returns and creates the deletion commands.
    ORMContainerEditPolicy  
    ORMDragEditPartsTracker  
    ORMModelXYLayoutPolicy
    This XYLayoutEditPolicy handels request for creation and boundarie changes of all kinds Shapess in a Model and returns and creates the nessecary commands for the creation and boundarie change.
    ORMNamedElementDirectEditPolicy
    This DirectEditPolicy shows DirectEdit feedback and creates the Command to perform a "direct edit" of a NamedElement name.
    ORMRelationBendpointEditPolicy
    Used to add Bendpoint handles on a ConnectionEditPart.
    ORMRelationConnectionEditPolicy
    This ConnectionEditPolicy handels requests for the deletion of Relations and returns and creats the deletion commands for this purpose.
    ORMRelationGraphicalNodeEditPolicy
    This GraphicalNodeEditPolicy handles request for the creations of all kinds of Relations between other Relations and creates and returns the necessary commands for that purpose.
    ORMSegmentXYLayoutPolicy
    This XYLayoutEditPolicy handles request for creation of attributes and operation in a Segment and returns and creates the necessary commands for the creation.
    ORMShapeComponentEditPolicy
    This ComponentEditPolicy handles requests for the deletion of Shapes and the step requests for stepping in and out of Shapess ftom type compartment and grouping.
    ORMShapeGraphicalNodeEditPolicy
    This GraphicalNodeEditPolicy handles request for the creations of all kinds of Relations between Shapes and creates and returns the necessary commands for that purpose.
